de.upb.t2t.control

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.t2t.control.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    The application's main controller class. It is the central access point for all parts of the application to, for example, fetch a property value (please note Properties vs Property, retrieve the MainTranscriptionPane or cleanly terminate the application.
    Author:
    Michel May (michel-may@gmx.de)

      • init

        public void init(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                 javafx.application.Application.Parameters args)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.net.URISyntaxException
        Used to initialise the application and primary stage.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the application's primary stage.
        args - any parameters parsed from the command line.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the application property files could not be found.
        java.io.IOException - if the application property files could not be read or the MainTranscriptionPane.MainTranscriptionPane() constructor threw one.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the classes to be initialised on startup could not be loaded.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if MainTranscriptionPane.MainTranscriptionPane() throws one.

        password - the password to update.
